alert.note: Alert for Sawyer (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 31 at 11:59AM CDT until October 31 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Sawyer County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Lac Courte Oreilles Reservation. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of moderate to heavy snow was occurring from northeast to southwest through Sawyer County from near Clam Lake through New Post to Edgewater. This band of snow will drift south through the afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
